snippet: The main slate of 33 features in the New York Film Festival offers a mixed bag of the sincere and the delirious, the predictable and the I-didn’t-see-that-coming unexpected.
abstract: New York Film Festival's 50th edition offers a dynamic mixed bag of 33 eclectic main features, ensuring that Richard Pena, the festival's guiding force who is retiring after 25 years, goes out with style.
lead_paragraph: The main slate of 33 features in the New York Film Festival offers a mixed bag of the sincere and the delirious, the predictable and the I-didn’t-see-that-coming unexpected.

headline.seo: The New York Film Festival’s 50th Edition
headline.main: ‘More’ Is the Mantra at This Festival
headline.print_headline: ‘More’ Is the Mantra at This Festival
